name: Creative Blogging Actions {Photoshop Users}
description:
In the Creative Blogging Actions Set there are 16 blog layout actions and 17 bonus actions, that you can use to help speed up your blogging as well as for inspiration. I use these actions in my daily workflow.

Each action is unique and different than the others. For example, there are three different “Contrast Boost” actions. They all give that boost using three different methods and each have a slightly different look. The vintage/haze actions are perfect for adding a little something to your pictures.

All blog template actions are sized at 900 pixels wide. You can resize that for specific blog dimensions that you want. These actions work in Photoshop only and can be used on any blog.

Bonus Actions: Facebook Resize, Horizontal 900px resize, Vertical Resize, Blogging Templates (You can see all that are included by viewing the gallery of images). Other bonus actions that are included are, Contrast Boost I,II,III, three different black and white actions, flattening action, web sharpening, print sharpening, 2 haze actions, vintage action, convert to sRGB action and a detail pop action.

Instructions are included in a PDF file, however if you are still having troubles or cant figure something out shoot me an email at info@jessicafeely.com and I can help solve any issues. These are so easy and fast to use you shouldn’t have any problems.

After payment you will instantly receive these actions via download.

*Due to the nature of this sale, there are no refunds.* *This version is for CS3, CS4, CS5 Only*

name: Word Templates
description:
These word templates are meant to have pictures added behind the letters for a fun and creative collage!

Includes:

(3) 10x20 Ready for Print Templates
(Family, Senior & Love)

(1) 12x12 Ready for Print Template
(Love)

Images are made to be printed on photographic paper through your preferred lab. Instructions are included.

(Check out my other listing for a Custom Name/Word Template)

Compatible in Photoshop & Elements!

All Sales are Final!

name: Custom Word Templates
description:
This is a made to order product. You will receive two (2) custom 10x20 templates with your custom names or words of your choice.

For example, you can order one with the name: Bailey
You may order a second custom name or word of your choice, for example: Birth

Digital Items will be delivered within 2 days of ordering.

Templates are meant to be printed through your professional lab and are compatible with Elements and Photoshop.

If you have any other custom requests for other sized templates, please ask!

name: One-on-One Mentoring
description:
As a teacher and photographer I love to bring these things together to teach aspiring photographers. Whether you are just starting out, or are looking for that competitive edge, I would love to work with you.

Just a few things I cover are:

-Beginning Camera Technique and know how
-Finding the light
-Working with subjects/posing
-All things with editing and your workflow
-Online Presentation
-Marketing and how to you get your name out there
-Business Questions + Pricing
-Portfolio + Branding Critique
-Weddings
-Seniors
-Families
...and more....

*Mentoring Price is on a per hour basis. We cover material based on your needs and wants. Everything is done over phone and web conferencing, or in person if you choose.*

Please contact me for more details!

name: Creative Blogging Templates {Elements Users}
description:
This set comes with 16 blogging templates and are compatible with Elements. 

All blog template actions are sized at 900 pixels wide. You can resize that for specific blog dimensions that you want. These actions can be used on any blog.

Instructions are included in a PDF file, however if you are still having troubles or cant figure something out shoot me an email at info@jessicafeely.com and I can help solve any issues. 

Since this is a digital download, all sales are final. Enjoy and do something creative!
